title: Client non-operational.
body:
Account bugged due to client crashing, it no longer lets me back into the game, as I log back in, all that appears is the "Reconnect" button that does not work.
 EDIT: It says i'm in a game but I am not able to be invited to another lobby to help get around the problem. URGENT HELP! 
Launching the legacy client simply removes me from the login screen and doesn't launch the old client, now I have 5 games of 5 minute queue times for nothing, I have now also left a lower priority game with a 5 minute queue time so I will most likely have 13-20 minute wait in the lower priority queue because the client has failed to operate. -_-

replies.body:
It doesn't sound like this was caused by a problem with the client, since you experienced issues with both the Legacy and Beta Client. These issues typically happen if your connection to our gameservers is poor, so I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for now.

If you have any further problems with this, let me know.
